channel.title: SuperScienceGrl
channel.description: Nessa Carson is a professional synthetic organic chemist working in drug discovery, and a freelance science writer and editor.

item.title: Conference database update
item.description:
• Fixed JavaScript bug causing out-of-page anchor links to fail
  • Added One Million Women to Tech volunteer work to the About page
  • Added the Swiss Chemical Society's AI in Chemical Research conference (free) to the Conference Database
  • Minor aesthetic change to Conference Database

item.title: Minor conference database update
item.description: • Added EaStCHEM Early Career Researcher Conference to the Conference Database.

item.title: Chemical Vendor Search (US) update
item.description: • Removed Ark Pharm from the Chemical Vendor Search page, for... strange reasons.

item.title: Site Update 13/05/2018
item.description:
• Created this RSS feed
  • Added extra links to fill Home page whitespace on large screens
  • Several new events added to the Conference Database
  • Fixed broken encrypted email link on Conference Database

item.title: A Sideways Look at Synthesis
item.description:
You can't always get what you want, but you might get what you need.

My second article in the Organic Matter column, in Chemistry World.

item.title: Site Update 10/05/2018
item.description:
• Secure HTTPS support complete. An external issue made it take a few days!
  • Added A Sideways Look At Synthesis to the Articles page
  • Registered for two conferences! Added to Conferences Attended page
  • Updated Conference Database
